reviewText: got it for my son. it is kind of short but he loves monster trucks so he enjoys it.
The entire movie is a series of 3-7 second clips of every monster truck making jumps! There is no narration and there is no footage amid a single full run. I'd give it 0 stars if I could.
My son LOVES this dvd! We're only keeping it because it does not skip... However the seller should have disclosed it's used and not new!!! The case was even gross with soda!
Our grandson has watched this DVD I think a million times...he thinks its great!! I wish there was talking and not just all footage tho.
DVD was in original plastic wrap and exactly as shown. Its a gift so I have not viewed but I'm sure my grandson will love it. Speedy delivery.

It came faster than it was estimated to be delivered...The quality of the dvd was great and entertained my son for hours...played it 3 times before he had enough of it  in one sitting...definitely recommend this dvd for any monster truck lovers.

I bought this for my two year old son and he likes to watch it. It's a good compilation of various trucks. The footage is grouped by the truck (several El Toro Loco clips, several Gravedigger, etc.)  and is more or less highlights of their runs. It's what I expected.
